title: A Residential rehab/renewal tenement shall essentially have a separate living room, kitchen, bedroom
clause_text: A Residential rehab/renewal tenement shall essentially have a separate living room, kitchen, bedroom, water closet unit, bathroom along with enclosed balcony merged in carpet area of the tenement
section: RELAXATION IN BUILDING AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS:

source_pdf.text_snippet: A Residential rehab/renewal tenement shall essentially have a separate living room, kitchen, bedroom, water closet unit, bathroom along with enclosed balcony merged in carpet area of the tenement
